page.title: 04 A Modernised Terraced House
page.content: Most Rushden terraced houses were built 90 years ago. Many have been modernised to make them comfortable. The house we saw has: double glazing, central heating, new wiring, is well maintained, decorated and carpeted {Living room:}cream decore,gold col- oured suite,video,T.V.,stereo,gas fire. {Dining room:}beige decore, large table and 8 chairs,organ,welsh dresser, gas fire. {Kitchen:}long,narrow,long sideboards and cupboards all around,gas oven,micro wave,single drainer sink,mixed gadgets {Pantry:}fridge/freezer,cloakroom. {Utility room:}(old outside toilet) small,w/machine,t/drier,toilet,pegs {3 Bedrooms:}1 large double,2 singles (inc. attic conversion),douvets,built in wardrobes,assorted furniture. {Bathroom:}large(old bedroom),green suite,tiling near bath(no shower).
